headline: Ask HN: Can competitors catch up to Apple Silicon?
description:
The Apple M1 Ultra SoC chip achieves 87% of the performance of the Intel 12900K and Nvidia RTX 3090 combined while only consuming 34% of the power. The entire M1 Ultra chip draws 225W at full load and 11w at idle. Forget the Nvidia card and the other PC components, the 12900K alone can draw 250W and the Ryzen 5950X 140W.

This is a seismic shift. Can Intel and the other players like AMD and Nvidia catch up to this peformace per watt that Apple has on their hands?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 竞争对手能追上苹果硅吗？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 競爭對手能追上蘋果硅嗎？
description_zh-Hans:
苹果M1 Ultra SoC芯片实现了英特尔12900K和Nvidia RTX 3090总和的87%的性能，而消耗的功率只有34%。整个M1 Ultra芯片满载时功耗为225W，空闲时为11W。抛开Nvidia卡和其他PC组件，仅12900K就能消耗250W，Ryzen 5950X则为140W。

这是一个地震式的转变。英特尔和其他玩家，如AMD和Nvidia，能否追上苹果手中的这种每瓦特的性能？
description_zh-Hant:
蘋果M1 Ultra SoC芯片實現了英特爾12900K和Nvidia RTX 3090總和的87%的性能，而消耗的功率只有34%。整個M1 Ultra芯片滿載時功耗為225W，空閒時為11W。拋開Nvidia卡和其他PC組件，僅12900K就能消耗250W，Ryzen 5950X則為140W。

這是一個地震式的轉變。英特爾和其他玩家，如AMD和Nvidia，能否追上蘋果手中的這種每瓦特的性能？
